arguments.title: [ComplianceSense] CE Marking Update – Impact on Medical Devices
arguments.body:
## Summary
- New conformity‑assessment steps for Class IIb and III devices (Art 5‑1 & 5‑2).
- Strengthened post‑market surveillance reporting (Art 8‑1, effective 2024‑01‑01).

## Gaps Identified
- **Art 5‑1**: Missing verification step for software‑driven IIb devices.
- **Art 5‑2**: Clinical evaluation annex not yet updated.

## Recommended Actions
1. Update the IIb conformity‑assessment SOP to include the new verification step (target 03 Feb 2024).
2. Revise the Class III clinical evaluation template per the new annex (target 10 Feb 2024).
3. Extend the PMS reporting schedule to capture the additional data fields (effective 01 Mar 2024).

Please review and assign owners.

messages.content: "The amendment adds new conformity‑assessment steps for Class IIb and III medical devices and requires enhanced post‑market surveillance reporting starting 1 Jan 2024."
Alert dispatched to Slack channel #compliance-alerts and email compliance.lead@company.com.

### Brief on Updated CE Marking Requirements (Medical Devices)

- **Key Changes**: New conformity‑assessment procedures for Class IIb (Art 5‑1) and Class III (Art 5‑2) devices, plus stricter post‑market surveillance reporting (Art 8‑1). Effective 1 Jan 2024.
- **Impact on Your Controls**: Existing controls CTRL‑CA‑001 and CTRL‑CA‑002 cover most of the new steps, but gaps were found:
  1. A verification step for software‑driven Class IIb devices is missing.
  2. The clinical‑evaluation annex for Class III devices needs updating.
- **Recommended Actions**:
  1. Amend the IIb conformity‑assessment SOP to include the new software verification (complete by 3 Feb 2024).
  2. Update the Class III clinical‑evaluation template (complete by 10 Feb 2024).
  3. Expand post‑market surveillance data collection to meet Art 8‑1 requirements (effective 1 Mar 2024).

I have already sent a detailed Slack/email alert to the compliance team and stored the amendment in the compliance database (record ID REG‑20231120‑001) for audit purposes. Let me know if you need deeper dive on any clause or assistance updating the SOPs.
